data.message: if your going to start charging 2.99 a month for using this page then you need to age verify your clients. because I'm pretty sure that you're supposed to be 18 to have an account and you guys don't enforce it. 2 if i want to make my profile private where no one can search me its my business, you making my profile public is against your own terms agreement. 3 peoples accounts should have their real name on them not what ever they want to be called, because if they can do that then why cant i have a private account?

replies.message: We understand your concerns, Don. We require everyone to provide their real names, so you always know who you're connecting with and we keep our community safe. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1yjMGKs. -Chantal
